data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 285,265 lost people in  An Nuqat al Khams, Libya have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of An Nuqat al Khams, Libya
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of An Nuqat al Khams words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 463 believers in An Nuqat al Khams to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in An Nuqat al Khams, Libya to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Arab, Libyan people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of An Nuqat al Khams, Libya.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in An Nuqat al Khams.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of An Nuqat al Khams, Libya the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

location.name: An Nuqat al Khams
location.people_groups_list: Algerian, Arabic-speaking, Berber, Jalo, Arab, Yemeni, Muhamasheen, Akhdam, Arab, Palestinian
